00044     // stacked_autoenocer : auto encoder class with greedy layer-wise training
00045   class AutoEncoder : public sequential_model
00046   {

00050                 const std::vector<int>& EncoderLayerDim, const std::vector<int>& DecoderLayerDim,
00051                                 const bool LayerMirror, const uint ActivationType,
00052                                 const float DropOut, const double lambda);
00053     ~AutoEncoder();
00054 
00055     void train(CircMat& X, const float LearnRate);
00056     void test(CircMat& X, CircMat& XP);
00057     void test(CircMat& X, CircMat& YP, CircMat& XP);

00060     void train_mini_batch(DataReader* Dataset);
00061

00064 
00065   public:

00068   };
